content: Hello Mister Heine, thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maria Mamani

content: Hello there! Thank you for considering my apartment for rental. I'm sure it's a great opportunity for you. So, what rental price are you looking for? I'm open to negotiating, but I want to make sure I get the best possible price for my property.
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I agree to the price of 500 Euros per month.
name: Maria Mamani

content: Thank you for your offer. While 500 Euros per month is certainly a fair price for a 25 square meter apartment, I'm afraid I'm not willing to accept that offer. I'm looking for a higher rental price that would better reflect the value of my property. I apologize if this is not within your budget, but I hope you understand my position. Would you be willing to discuss a higher rental price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
550 Euros per month.

I understand your position, but I'm afraid I can't go higher than 550 Euros per month. That's the maximum amount I can offer.

Is there any chance we could come to an agreement on 550 Euros per month?
name: Maria Mamani

content: Thank you for your counteroffer of 550 Euros per month. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm afraid that's still not within my range. I'm looking for a rental price that better reflects the value of my property and the market conditions in the area. I apologize if this is not within your budget, but I hope you can understand my position. At this time, I think we need to terminate the negotiation. Thank you for your time and interest in my apartment.
name: Heinrich Heine
